description: Transport-specific view of patient records. This file is a convenience subset — the actual transport data lives on the PatientRecord entity. These 3 records are the transported patients from patient-records.json with transport details highlighted.
note: This file does NOT represent a separate entity. It provides a transport-focused reference to the 3 patients who were transported. Import patient-records.json — transport fields are included there.

transportSummary.notes: STEMI protocol not applicable. Trauma alert called. Estimated 8-minute transport.
Chest trauma with respiratory compromise. BVM assist en route. Trauma alert called.
STEMI alert activated. Door-to-cath-lab target met. Patient transferred to cardiac cath lab on arrival.
